players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "Charlie, I have reason to believe you are the mafioso. Can you explain why Alice was killed?"
You: "Charlie, I think you're the mafioso because Alice was killed. If you were innocent, you would have said something about it last night."
Charlie: "I am the mafioso, and I killed Alice as planned. The detective will find me out eventually."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
